lead_paragraph: Angelique Kerber produced a polished display to claim her second straight win at the WTA Finals with a 6-4 6-2 victory over Simona Halep on Tuesday, the world number one virtually booking a spot in the semi-finals of the elite eight-woman event.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Turns on the Style to Overwhelm Halep
headline.main: Kerber Turns on the Style to Overwhelm Halep
